description.narrative: Overall objective of the project is to enhance the capacity of civil society to promote democracy by increasing transparency of the local public authorities and civic participation in the decision-making process in Chisinau suburbs. The project puts pressu re for a more transparent and responsive to citizens? needs public authorities in Durlesti and Codru suburb and aims to equip citizens with information and tools to participate in decision-making process. Primaria MEA is a young civil society organisation with young team. However the team has organised similar kind of project in Chisinau town council with good results. This time the project will be implemented in Chisinau suburbs called Codru and Durlesti. In order to reach accessible information about the activity of local authorities from Durlesti and Codru the team will inform suburbs? residents about the activity of local authorities: collect information about newly elected councilors and create their profiles on our platforms; broadcast LIVE on Facebook local councils? sittings; provide easy to understand summaries and analysis of the meetings and develop and distribute community newsletters. The team will engage and train group of young local volunteers to increase the awareness of residents of local co mmunity problems and engaged residents decision-making process. The project will also organize advocacy campaigns on 2 local issues selected by the residents. Finally the project aims to engage local administration in Codru and Durlesti engaged in communic ation with citizens by organizing public meetings with citizens representatives of local public administrations and representatives of Chisinau City Hall in order to discuss identified issues and potential solutions.
